snippet.title: Randy Blaster 3D  [ALPHA 2] - Trailer - Retro FPS
snippet.description:
Randy Blaster 3D is a satirical retro-style FPS with deep Twitch integration and a custom run-builder sandbox. Face off against an evil overlord named Randy and his devoted followers, battle hordes of corrupted beasts, and collect Randy’s Vinyls of Power to bring his reign of terror to an end. One tyrant, one castle, one chance of salvation . . .

The official release brings the addition of two new game modes, Solo Survival, and Twitch Survival. The player battles endless waves of enemies until they are overtaken. Build custom run modes and share them with friends. If playing with twitch integration the player can enable twitch specific events to trigger custom game actions.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1591960/Randy_Blaster_3D
Website: https://randyblaster.com

Story
Ages ago, the VaporVerse dwelled in peace. Its people lived out their quiet lives in harmony with nature and with each other. One day, out of the darkness of the evil RandyVerse arose the hellish entity Randy. In a brutal invasion, he and his horrific army pillaged the lands, slaughtering all who dared oppose his new rule.
After more than a century of defeat, despair, and doom, a new hero has risen up—the only one with the strength and courage to take on the dastardly Randy. This hero has trekked across the realms, battling soldiers, monsters, and dark forces to the doorstep of evil itself, Randy’s Fortress in the heart of the RandyVerse.
Will this courageous one be able to take control of the secret to Randy’s rule, the Vinyls of Power, and dethrone this otherworldly tyrant?
